sentence.Network_en: He was earning £215 a week before tax: take-home pay, £170.
sentence.Network_cn: 他税前的周薪是215英镑，实发170英镑。

sentence.Network_en: They work long hours in order to take home a fat wage packet.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了多赚点儿工资，他们加班加点地工作。

sentence.Network_en: You get to sample lots of baked things and take home masses of cookies besides.
sentence.Network_cn: 您不仅可以品尝各种烘烤糕点，还可以带很多饼干回家。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 关于take的用法及词组_百度知道 ... If you take 3 from 10 you have 7. 十减三剩七。 take-home 实得工资 take-in [口]欺骗, 欺诈.
take the brunt of 的解释- take the brunt... ... take thought 打算€寻思€ 考虑 take-home 带回家的 take film 拍成电影.
取的形式，有课堂答卷考试(in-class)，回家限时考试(take-home) ，论文(paper)，亦凡公益图书馆(shuku.net)下一章　回目录

the fall in the growth of workers take-home pay could even steeper , as companies cut back on overtime pay , a big source of income for urban workers , Fishwick said .工人们税后工资的增长率下跌可能更为陡峭，因为企业已经削减了加班工资，菲施维克认为，这是城市工人收入的一大来源。

means.word_mean: 1. (of salary or wages) remaining after all deductions including taxes
